input.sentences: the gang was prepared to visit the city
the little ones had a great time
and it was fun for everyone
nancy loved the view with her grand kids
and they all had a great time
output.sentences: Today was our familys first time in San Francisco.
Little Joey wanted to feel tall so he hopped up on the rail.
The trolley was fun and we felt like we were in a movie.
Then we went to the bay and saw some sea lions.
Joey was excited to ride the carousel after a long day of walking.
